definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
Ouyang Xiu (1007-1072), Northern Song dynasty prose writer and historian
Ouyang Xun (557-641), one of Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang 唐初四大家[Tang2 chu1 Si4 Da4 jia1]

sentences.english: Ouyang Xiu Systematize ZhengXuan's sub-system of poems in a systematic order.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽修還對鄭玄《詩譜》的世次體系進行了系統整理。

sentences.english: First day at work, Ouyang went to the office to arrange Hao relics.
sentences.chinese: 上班的第一天，歐陽去辦公室整理昊的遺物。

sentences.english: The noised classroom becomes quiet and we are astonished to look over at Ouyang.
sentences.chinese: 亂哄哄的教室靜了下來，我們驚異地望着歐陽老師。

sentences.english: The status of Ouyangxiu, in the history of politics and literature, has been defined.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽修在歷史和文學上的地位，幾乎已有定論。

sentences.english: Ou-yang Xiu was a man of great importance in shaping the literati culture of the Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽脩在宋代士大夫新文化的型塑過程中極具影響力。

sentences.english: Jin is my man, I'll be rooting for him forever!
sentences.chinese: 歐陽靖是我的英雄，我會永遠支持他。

sentences.english: These exist in the dark about the crisis, Ouyang are not without worries.
sentences.chinese: 談起這些存在的暗在危機，歐陽不無憂慮。

sentences.english: Director of the Hunan Radio and Television Station Ouyang Changlin made a speech on television culture.
sentences.chinese: 湖南廣播電視臺臺長歐陽常林就電視文化發表了演講。

sentences.english: At the age of 12 Gin Oy first heard the rapper L.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽靖12歲第一次聽到黑人說唱歌手L。

sentences.english: I have to take Mr. Ouyang from Company X out drinking tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我得招待X公司的歐陽經理出去喝酒。

sentences.english: Master Hongqi's illness, Ouyang grams and want to take advantage of her.
sentences.chinese: 洪七公的病情加重，歐陽克又想乘人之危。

sentences.english: Ouyang, you should speak to know who you are.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽，聽你說話就知道你是誰。

sentences.english: You don't know the rules of the Ouyang ?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道歐陽家的規定？

sentences.english: But that's because she'd want to learn the latest news of Ouyang Feng.
sentences.chinese: 我去探望歐陽峯，因爲她想知道歐陽峯的消息。

sentences.english: But that's because she'd want to learn the latest news of Ouyang Feng.
sentences.chinese: 我去探望歐陽峯，因爲她想知道歐陽峯的消息。

sentences.english: Ouyang following the stick to cross-examine, force uncle he locked in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 歐陽繼堅持追問，力叔竟將他反鎖在洗手間內。

definition: (classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
